Name: Lime Blush
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at Blue Bar, Four Seasons Hotel, Hong Kong, China.
Nutrition: One serving of Lime Blush contains 103 calories
